name: Arise from Shadows
description:
Arise from Shadows is a game in which you play a spectre in search for your past. You lost your memory and have no clue where you are. During your adventure, you will find remnants of a former civilization that has completely vanished. Who were they ? How did they disappear ?

EXPLORE
The Arise from Shadows is a world full of mysteries, and your wanderings will take you to places as dark as they are exotic.

TAKE POSSESSION OF CREATURES
Use your power to take control of several creatures in order to use their skills. On earth, as well as under the water and in the air, take full advantage of their unique characteristics.

FIND THE TRUTH
Benefit from the knowledge of an ancient people whose answers, which are as nebulous as they are disturbing, will be given to you through interactive stelae.

FULL IMMERSION
Enjoy the VR experience, to live every moment as the spectre you're about to be.
